title: user login functionality
description: Verify that the user can successfully log in with valid email and password credentials and receives a 200 status code. Also verify that invalid credentials return a 401 status code.

title: user logout functionality
description: Verify that the user can successfully log out and receives a 200 status code confirming logout.

title: super admin dashboard data retrieval
description: Verify that the Super Admin can retrieve their dashboard data successfully with a 200 status code.

title: admin dashboard data retrieval
description: Verify that the Admin can retrieve their dashboard data successfully with a 200 status code.

title: manager dashboard data retrieval
description: Verify that the Manager can retrieve their dashboard data successfully with a 200 status code.

title: employee dashboard data retrieval
description: Verify that the Employee can retrieve their dashboard data successfully with a 200 status code.

title: get all clients
description: Verify that the API returns a list of all clients with a 200 status code.

title: create new client
description: Verify that a new client can be created successfully by posting valid client data and receiving a 201 status code.

title: client onboarding process
description: Verify that the client onboarding process completes successfully and returns a 200 status code.

title: get all employees
description: Verify that the API returns a list of all employees with a 200 status code.
